attributes.action:
Call a Cooling off period post referendum  
Have a second refurendum
attributes.additional_details:
Already Nigel Farage has disowned a pledge to spend £350 million of European Union cash on the NHS after Brexit on which people will have voted in faith.
Scaremongering and divisive tactics were used in campaigns dividing communities
Referendum has to be based on fact and not fear or propaganda for the sake of our future , the potential break up of the united kingdom and exit from Europe Must be based on informed decisions.
.
attributes.background: We have been tainted with divisive campaigning and tactical lies in the lead up to the referendum . This resulted in people voting from fear  not on facts,  we need a further referendum to ensure it really reflects the nations Will being enabled to make an informed decision of real consensuses
